mapper.select: SELECT authority.id, authority.name FROM authority INNER JOIN ur_pm_auy ON authority.id = ur_pm_auy.auyId AND ur_pm_auy.pmId = #{pmId} AND ur_pm_auy.deleteFlg = '0' INNER JOIN user ON ur_pm_auy.urId = user.id AND user.handle = #{handle} WHERE authority.deleteFlg = '0'
